meanings.definition: The plural form of the noun 'vin', meaning wine.
meanings.sent1: At the party, they served various vins from different regions.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys tasting different vins to discover new flavors.
meanings.sent3: The vins at the vineyard were so delicious that they danced in the glasses.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the vins filled the room like a bouquet of flowers.
meanings.sent5: The vins sparkled in the sunlight, tempting all who passed by.

meanings.definition: The third person singular form of the verb 'vin', meaning to come.
meanings.sent1: Every morning, his vins to work were always punctual.
meanings.sent2: She waits eagerly for his vins to visit her on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected vins of the mailman startled the dog.
meanings.sent4: Hope vins quietly, like a whisper in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The sound of vins echoed through the empty streets, announcing his arrival.
